English: Now, this... brings back feelings.
It’s meaningless, but something I don't want to let go...
This obscure feeling... is lingering inside my head.
(Here, in this frozen land, Arlette’s body will rest forever.)
(Only the still frozen corpse... will remain in her stead.)
Such cold...
I thought the frozen wind of this place could never touch me...
This extreme cold that is enough to freeze my bones... It’s invading my every skin.
When I woke up, it was going to be the ninetieth winter.
And... today is the hundredth winter.
... Now I see.
He pointed his spear at me even though he knew he could die...
It was out of sad desperation that even the exploited heart from all the constant waiting
could not even dismiss.
Though I have to say that his feeling of longing...
and mine are clearly different.
Being different
means the weight of pain to endure is also different...
(A feeling of wanting to see someone who might be alive...)
(And a feeling of saying farewell to someone who will never return...)
I am worried about you.
We are here with you now,
But if we leave, you will be left all alone again, right?
(Yes... I remember.)
(You came here with survivors of a fallen nation. You were exhausted and weak.)
(But you were different from other humans.)
(Even though I treated you as a nuisance and tried to drive you out, you always treated me kindly.)
(To be honest, there were many times when I was annoyed with you...)
(But those conversations we had... They were quite meaningful.)
That reminds me.
You told me what you put inside those cookies you made, and how you met Kyle...
You told me about those places Kyle took you and Maria to...
To think back, all the conversations were about your personal life.
(But listening to her speak... Those conversations weren't boring.)
Hey, Pavel...
I hope... you meet someone who understands...
What was that? That felt like a very important piece of memory...
...No one’s around.
No words from Lewisia too...
and where’s Rodina?
Hehehe. The search ended rather quick.
Hope Pavel likes this one!
Rodina.
Oh, Pavel, you were here first! It’s good that you are here. I have something-
Pavel?
...The blizzard is strong today. You should come back early in days like this.
Wow, were you actually worried about me, Pavel?
It’s okay. I had some things to take care of in the village. That’s all.
I have something I wish to give you.
Something to give me?
Happy birthday, Pavel! You were looking a bit down as of recent. I prepared something special to cheer you up.
Birthday?
You told me a while ago, remember?
That you were congratulated around this time of the year in the past.
That only explains one thing: Your birthday is today.
...Wait... Don't tell me I got it all wrong.
I hope that one day,
you would find someone who understands you other than me...
I hope you find someone who gets angry for you and gets you gifts from time to time...
I hope you find someone like that who will stay by your side...
(Now I remember... Arlette, she... told me that in the past.)
(Someone who understands... and stays by my side...)
...Pavel?
I will put it to good use.
It’s been a while, Rodina. Bit sad though, that you are getting transferred to a new post on your birthday.
Sergeant Rodina Klein! It is an honor to serve, Vice Commander Fluss!
Hey, hey, easy there. No need to get so tight out in private.
T-then... It’s been a while, Fluss.
Uh-huh. So what brings you here? Are you here for your gift? Or is it the mission you were assigned to?
Ah, I-I do not need any presents. I visited you for the mission.
I definitely heard that it’s an escort mission,
but the more I look into it after accepting it, this mission... It’s...
Yeah, you are basically monitoring him.
You do know who you are moni- pardon me, escorting, right?
Yes, sir. I heard that he is a very powerful wizard whom the Empire is keeping eyes on.
Correct. There’s no one in the Empire who can defeat him in his magic range. At least until now.
That’s why the Empire gave you this order.
As the best sniper in the Empire, you can easily snipe him outside his magic range.
I know what you are thinking; that you picked up your rifle not to kill people, but to protect them.
If it’s that, then don't worry.
Just be yourself and do your job as a soldier like you always have.
I... see. Understood, sir. I shall do my best to successfully conclude this mission, sir.
It’s pretty... far... and pretty... cold too!
A Wizard of Ice Dragon that lives in a place like this...
.........That must be him...
Salutations, I am Rodina Klein, Sergeant First Class. The Empire dispatched me here.
Are you Pavel?
...Yes.
I am here to fulfill my duty as your escort. Pleased to meet you.
...I don’t really need escorting, but fair enough.
Just a reminder: I hate noisy people. Keep this in mind.
Understood!
I have a feeling that this mission will not be an easy one.
I’m worried if I will be able to befriend him...
Rodina, are you here?
Good day, Yanne! Welcome.
What brings you here this time?
So I received this mission from a high-ranking official of the Empire.
He told me to hand you his birthday present.
A present from a high-ranking official? Could it be...
Tcha!
This is all... for me?
Yep. Though not all of them are from him.
Here. Some letters for you.
I knew it was from Fluss.
.....Again with these corny remarks... As expected...
And these are... from my family.
All of this? That’s a lot. Mind if I have a look?
Oh... So you are the youngest daughter of a big family. No wonder you have so many letters delivered to you!
And um... I also have something to give you.
You would like to give me something?
Sorry it’s something cheap. I prepared it rather hastily. Happy birthday.
No, no, don’t apologize. Thank you so much for this!
Oh, look at this mountain of presents. Don't tell me the birthday party is over so soon.
Lewisia? Come in, come in. How did you know it was my birthday today?
Well, someone asked me what do you usually give for birthdays. I naturally figured it out that it was someone’s birthday.
Here you go. Happy birthday, Rodina.
Huh? Wow... I can’t believe I just got a present from the princess...
It is thanks to you that Pavel is doing much much better.
It’s something even his old friends, us, couldn’t do.
I-I’m honored by your compliment... Thank you sincerely.
...Noisy.
Oh, Pavel. Was it too noisy?
It's okay... Happy birthday.
Hmm? Well, this is something I didn’t expect to see... You didn't follow my advice.
...I did take note of it. I just thought this would fit Rodina more.
Hmmm...
......I remember......
Um... Sorry to bother you...
...What is it?
Well... Today is my birthday...
My family sent me a cake. Would you like to have some?
No.
O... kay...
Pavel, are you home?
What is it?
I received a birthday cake.
Would you like to have some?
...I refuse.
Understood...
I remember that at first, you rarely responded to me and avoided my questions.
However, as time went by, you started listening to me,
and responded every time I spoke to you.
Although it may not be much, but ultimately, you’ve changed a lot, Pavel.
If what Lewisia said about you being much better is this...
And to think that my efforts contributed to that improvement...
This is an excellent present by itself.
....That said, I think he'll say yes this time...
Dammit, why aren't there any strong Demons here?
What a waste of time... It’s been like this for a while. How frustrating.
...I’m gonna get rid of this frustration by eating something tasty. To the village, I go.
What’s wrong with me today? The food doesn't taste good, and I feel rather depressed.
...What a bad day. I don't even want to eat a Demon.
Hey, mister, let me ask you something.
What day... of what month is today?
Hey. Human!
Wake up, human!
HEY!! Vi!!
Hmm? Huh?
*Sigh* Seriously..
Why are you always like this on this particular day of the year?
Oh... I’m sorry...
This is why I don’t like human emotions.
Look, I know today is the day your village was burned to the ground,
all the people you knew were killed,
and your body was torn to pieces.
But you are alive here and now.
You even have the power for vengeance now.
What is it then? You need something more?
Hey! I’m talking to you, human!
Ah, to hell with it. What should I freaking do?!
Huh? Oh, it’s Crab Legs.
Hmm? Do you know that person?
Person? Well, she’s someone like me.
I thought I told you about her before. The one I met at Dragia Volcano.
She looks quite upset today, though.
Hey, Crab Legs!
You are eating so much as usual.
How do you eat that much with such a small human stomach?
Huh? Oh, it’s the Half Breed.
I’m not feeling so good today. Don’t you pick a fight.
...Something wrong?
Your face looks 10 times angrier than usual.
It’s the human host who’s making me real annoyed.
Humans... They just don’t let go of what they lost and cry and lament over it...
Pathetic creatures...
You really are an idiot.
You should apologize to her. This is clearly your fault.
Hey, don't blame me!
And why should I? I said nothing wrong!
You should just let go of-
You forged a possession contract with that girl! You are responsible for your host!
When I asked Epis, she told me most possessions are done forcibly.
...Come on, that’s different. It’s done to make an example out of arrogant-
Ah, what the hell! Look, I don't care about what situation you are in,
and I’m clearly not an expert at that area,
but just think about it: You are angry and annoyed about something.
The problem is, you have no means to resolve those feelings. How would you feel?
...Tsk.
Understand? Then solve it!
Stupid glutton...
...Ah, screw this!!
I’m gonna teach you a lesson next time we meet, Half Breed...
HEY!! We need to talk, human!
Well, um...
Uh... Ah, whatever.
If you are really not feeling so good today,
then how about this? I will give you control over this body for today.
Do as you will. I’m not going to interfere.
Go back to your hometown and see your family’s graves or something.
Be thankful for this. You are not supposed to have control now, but I’m breaking the contract rules just this time.
*Grumble...*
Hometown...
Mom... Dad...
...Thank you, Viska...
Your birthday should be a happy day, but you don't look happy.
That’s why I will give you this.
Princess must laugh. Only then others can all laugh.
Flower. I’m glad it’s still fresh.
Ah, to think of it, it’s been some time since my birthday passed...
You've always protected me and gave me precious gifts.
I’m afraid I returned nothing to you. How shameful of me...
Not true. Princess gave me name.
Princess gave me mission. ...Princess forgave me, who tried to kill her.
Princess gave me everything. Princess gave a lot.
...Haha. I am happy to hear that.
But now is now.
Think about what you want.
Be it a holiday, money... anything...
If it’s something I can give, then I will give it to you.
That is, at this journey’s end.
...Hard. It’s like a homework Demia gives to me.
Hahaha. Think hard.
What I want to receive...
What I need... What I want to get...
Hmm...
Ugh, where did he go?!
Captain Demia will scold us if we are too late...
There! Found you! Chase!!
Huh? Hey, Chase...
Is he sleeping standing up?
Chase!!
...Clause.
Don't sleep here like this. You are going to catch a cold.
What happened? Did the captain scold you again? Were you feeling down about it?
No. I was just thinking-
Late?
The princess told me to think about what I want to receive.
Too hard... I was thinking about it all day. The day is gone.
Haha... It really is a difficult task.
(Hm... Perhaps she wanted to give something in return for her birthday present.)
If it’s too hard thinking about what you want to receive,
then how about something you like?
Something like food. You like food, no?!
......Something I like......
I know.
Yes! Then you can tell that to Her High-
My name. I like my name.
...Huh?
I like the pauldron Demia gave me.
I like the handkerchief princess gave me.
I like patrolling, escorting, Clause, Loman, Demia, Princess...
I like them all.
.....Maybe Demia is a bit scary.
Hahahaha! Captain really is scary when she's angry.
Okay. Found the answer. I go to princess now.
Princess is waiting. Have to go back before too late.
Huh? Hey, wait!!
Haha... Interesting...
It should be fine like this.
Her Highness will be happy to hear that from Chase.
I told him to think, not to wander somewhere...
I sent Clause to get him. They will be back soon.
...If Clause takes too long to find him or if Chase attacks-
Rest your worries. Such things will not happen.
You should know very well that he is no longer dangerous.
But...
The hour is getting late, and it’s dinner time. We should prepare food.
Allow me to perform that task, Your Highness.
I will not stay idle and wait for them to come.
Alright. I shall leave it to you then.
Princess!!
Chase. Where were you venturing off-
I found it. Something I like.
Hmm? Something you like...
Good. Do tell. What is it you like the most?
A lot of things.
I like my name.
...What?
My name. Patrolling. Princess, Demia. Clause. Loman.
Handkerchief princess gave me. Walking with princess. Escorting princess.
Now now, that’s enough...
Was that the reason why you were late? Trying to come up with those thoughts?
Clause helped. I thought hard.
...Haha...
Hahahaha.
Princess?
...I said something wrong?
No. Not at all.
Thank you for telling me that.
Now then... You thought hard about it. You deserve to be rewarded.
Your name... Things you like...
Chase. From now on, your name is Chase.
My name.
If you don't remember anything,
then I will give you the reason to live.
Live for me.
...Yes... That should do.
That?
I gave you your name, and now you started a new life with it.
There should be a day to celebrate it.
I hereby declare this day as your birthday. How is that?
...Birthday...
Another gift from princess...
I like it. I like it very much.
Anything from princess is good,
but this is as good as my name.
I’m glad you like it.
Then, although it’s a bit late in the evening, we should prepare a birthday party.
I should tell Demia to cook more food.
I am Chase.
No matter what happens, even if I get my memory back,
I will stay beside those I like. With her...
Forever and always, as Chase.
Happy birthday, Esker!
I um... prepared a small gift for you!
My birthday is nothing special. I’m surprised you remembered it.
Of course I have to remember an important day like this!
Now, whenever my birthday approaches, it brings back the memory of that time as a dream...
Huh? What are you saying all of a sudden?
Nevermind. I’m happy that you prepared a gift for me. Haha.
That’s one of the cards you use.
It’s not the same card that you use, but tarot cards are interesting friends too.
I specially engraved today’s date behind this one for you.
Also... One more thing!!
Hmm?
I will show you how I shuffle. It’s that method you taught me!
Get ready to be enchanted by this spectacle! Hehe.
I remember you being quite awkward with shuffling. You seem confident now.
Of course! I practiced it again and again!
Just watch! Like this, like that, anddd!!
Ta-da!!! Huh?!
W-why?! Again! Again!!
Ta-da!!
Huh??
Ta-da!!
Why?! Why isn't this working?
Ah...
Um... So... uh... This worked perfectly moments ago...
This worked perfectly moments ago...
That really was a spectacle.
Don't tease me, Esker!
Haha. I really meant it.
Give them to me.
Let me show you again.
Don’t you get tired of dreaming the same dream again and again?
Now it feels like you are just entering the dream on your own volition.
Why is my gut never wrong?
I will never get used to your uncomfortable disguise of me.
Well, this is the coolest look I can display.
If you don't like it, then how about this?
Get out of my dream.
That’s harsh.
But the dimension you’ve created is my playground.
Haha, how brazen.
Not as brazen as you by the gambling table.
I would like to suggest one thing. Don't go to that place tomorrow.
A birthday should be an enjoyable day.
Hm... I know what you are getting at,
but my birthday is meaningless now.
A day like that should be celebrated with precious ones. That’s when birthdays shine.
Well... It's up to you to decide.
Still, it’s a bit sad.
Those precious ones you mentioned
wouldn't even know that you are denying even the slightest happiness.
Like... That girl just now.
I find your words very thankful and annoying at the same time.
Alright. You win.
I will go somewhere different tomorrow.
[Center of Village]
A normal day... It’s been too long.
No! I lost again!!!
Yuss! Gimme! Gimme!
Argh, dammit. My precious coins...
Kehaha! Scrubs!
You are all so bad at this!
Ahaha! I should be able to repay Kibera with this.
Who the hell are you?
A game, if you would.
Ha! Here comes another loser!
An hour later
I-is that even possible?
He didn't lose a single game so far.
*Crowd chatter*
[8 Game Loss Streak]
Again!!!
Aren't you stretching this a bit too far?
Shut up!!!! 20!
I got 21. I win. Haha.
Ahhhhh!!!
[9 Game Loss Streak]
[12 Game Loss Streak]
[15 Game Loss Streak]
[18 Game Loss Streak]
[20 Game Loss Streak]
[22 Game Loss Streak]
You dirty cheater!
Haha. It’s not cheating.
It’s luck. You just have to give in to it.
Thank you for giving me an extraordinary gift on this special day.
Ah.
Let’s just say I’m giving you this as a token of gratitude.
I have no use for it, but I feel that this is an essential item for you.
I decided to call it a fortune-bringing chip.
Arghh!!! You piece of-
Thank you for your kind words.
Ahhhhhh!!! I’m gonna kill you!!!!!
Kyaaaa!!
Ahhh!! He's gone completely nuts!
Well, this is bad... Let us conclude the game here. I don’t want to be involved in this mess.
They say fate guides each and every one of us. I’m sure this encounter had its purpose.
Haha, until next time then.
Where do you think you are going?!!!
Oh, and one more thing. That thing I gave you is quite an expensive one. Try not to lose it. Haha.
STOP!!! GIMME BACK MY MONEY!!!!!!
Hahaha. Well, I haven’t had that much fun in a while.
Feels like this world is still fun. There are a lot of fun things to see and experience.
(You puzzle me.)
(How could you give something you won in a secret gambling house to that stranger?)
(Still... I guess all that matters is that you enjoyed the day.)
Did you find her?
I-I think... Her Highness has left the palace already.
*Sigh* I can't believe I actually thought she was settled now.
Hurry! Find Her Highness before the words reach the royal guard commander’s ears!
As you command!
Good. It’s going to take some time to find that letter.
The royal guards will scold me if they find out,
but I really have to meet him today.
I have to hurry.
...Um... It's good that I got out of the palace,
but what now? Where should I go to?
I shouldn’t give up here.
Hmm? This energy... it’s...
Why are you hesitating so much?
What’s the big deal about this country? Huh?
Did you forget what they said already?!
They told you that they well spare your life but never return!
Kehaha! They said that as if they were being merciful to you, but they are all just a bunch of pretenders!
I should have beheaded them while I had the chance!
......Shut up.
Be nice!
I’m your only friend now! You hear me?!
(So... I really have to leave my nation...)
(I couldn't even say goodbye to her...)
(I will never hear her voice again...)
Bernheim!!
(Yes... I will never hear...)
(Her voice aga-)
Your Highness? How did you-
This is the border zone! Did you come here alone?
There are dangerous monsters running rampant. Why did-
Enough.
Is that all you have to say?
Today is your birthday, Bernheim.
I personally came to congratulate your birthday!
You don’t stop nagging even in a situation like this.
T-that’s... I...
......Forgive me, Your Highness.....
I should punish the sinner. Here, your punishment.
This is...
An essence of my light.
It’s nothing special, but it should be useful as a self-defense tool.
Your Highness, this is too much for me... Why-
...What, you don't like it?
N-no, that’s not it. It’s just that-
Kehaha!! Look at you! So weak in front of a puny girl!
I can devour her in one bite!!
So it’s you. The demonic sword that Bernheim took.
Not afraid of me, huh? Interesting.
Ah-ha! I know! You act all self-righteous and mighty because you have the light behind your back!
Cut the crap. You are the one who exiled him. No use pretendi-
Argh!!
Forgive his insolence, Your Highness.
I can't stop that demonic sword because I’m weak and foolish...
That’s alright. It's actually more fun that way.
I’m also glad to hear from the demonic sword. I have a feeling that he thinks of you quite preciously.
Hmph! Of course! He and I are like one bod-
Keh!
...Hahaha.
...That sword's words have some truth in them, though.
I could neither stop you from getting exiled nor advocate for you.
Your Highness...
But that’s why
I will try my best to return you to Penteonia.
I know it will take long, and everyone will disagree with me.
But I give you my word. I will make it happen.
I know it may sound shameless, but will you wait for me?
...Yes, Your Highness. I shall wait for you until my last breath.
Thank you for your trust.
I should be the one to thank you
for giving me the best birthday present of my life.
Hey boss, you dropped this!
Ahhh!!
It’s soaked in blood!!!
Why did you have to taint it with your touch?!
Boss! Boss!! Calm down!
Most of our earnings are spent on treating comrades who got beaten by you!
Get lost!! You goons are gonna die fighting anyway! One death doesn't change anything!
Don’t just stand there!! Apologize! Now!
I-I’m sorry!!!
I'll kill you! I'm gonna kill you right now!!!
Are you okay now?
*Pant...*
Why did you get so angry?! What's that item to you?
Dayum, that was awesome!
It’s so convenient that you don’t even have to load bullets every time!
One shot and booooom!!
This junk, on the other hand, eats bullets like a pig.
W-well, but it’s not all bad, though... I’m satisfied with it...
It’s just that I feel like I could use a different... weapon sometimes.
I-I guess I’m just gonna ask Valance to make me a new one...
What’s with that face, old man?! Seriously! What is it?!
Crow?
Did you finish working on that weapon I ordered?
Oh, I finished that ages ago.
I have to ask, though... This thing won’t fit your weapon.
Akistra doesn't need a speed loader anyway.
Wait... Is this for his birthday?
So you do care about him.
...He just needs a bit of work, that’s all.
Sure, sure...
Die! Die! You die as well!!
Get me someone stronger!!
Hahahahahahahahaha!!!
Huh!? Where do you think you are going?!
I have hundreds of bullets to shoot through your sku-
Ah, dammit...
Done! Time for round two-
What the? Where did that bastard run off to?!
That son of a!!!
Chasers?
Same old losers.
They died too easily, though. It was so boring.
I could have killed like 15 more of them if reloading wasn’t so inconvenient.
Reloading sucks on this weapon!
I really should ask Valance to make me something.
Huh? Old ma-
Ouch!!
Now quit complaining.
No need for you guys to know.
But I want to hear.
You want to die too?
S-sorry.
Oh, by the way, a letter was forwarded to you.
There is something like a wolf on the stamp.
Th-
This is...
Boss? Who’s the letter from?
Outta my way! I’m leaving!
Where are you going?!
Hmm? I’m heading off to meet my boss.
Your boss?! What are you talking about?
Hey boss!!!
Shut up!! SHUT UP!
Naila... Please take care of our kin...
Sister......
I can finally read the flow of wind!
Maybe I can become a windcaster like you!
Ahhhhhhh! I think wind spells aren't for me!
Wind riding is the best. It makes me so happy.
Maybe I don’t have to become a windcaster as you are already one, sis.
I’m going to become a warrior and protect you!
Haha, you will become a fine warrior, Naila.
I was too weak and too helpless back then.
I couldn’t protect you, sister.
But I will give my all
to fulfill your promise until the end.
Naila, take pride. You are a Harpy.
I need more power.
Hmm? She’s...
I was right. You were here.
Everyone's looking for you, Naila.
Princess Selene... Is there a matter so urgent that required you to visit?
Oh, yes.
Your birthday, Naila.
I... don't think it’s something of great importance. You don't have to do so much for this.
Yes, I do. This is important.
As the leader of the Harpies, your birthday should be celebrated for the harmony of all races.
It’s nothing to be ashamed of.
But I am still lacking...
I am a princess, and I still feel there are areas I’m inadequate at.
But to think of it, that feeling of inadequacy is what drives me to be better.
I see.
There is actually one important reason why I visited you today.
Please take this. I made a ribbon and enchanted it with the magic of Notos. I want this to help you achieve the things you wish to accomplish.
As this is just a tiny present, I thought it would be better for me to give this to you
before the official celebration.
Th- thank you.
I will never forget your gift and your words.
You will be bombarded with massive gifts and words of celebration today.
You will not even remember that you were given such a small present before that.
Th- that’s not true.
Hahaha. It was just a jest.
We all know that you will not forget what took place today, Naila.
Now please make your way to the celebration. Everyone’s waiting for you.
(She came to me first to empower me...)
Princess Selene, I have a favor to ask of you.
As the leader of the Harpies, I believe I still lack in strength.
Will you help me with my training?
Of course. You need not ask.
(The wind that Queen Balalaika once blew...)
(I’m going to surpass it.)
Watch over me, Himmullis!
